overview:
Lena Wilson is the Chief Operating Officer of Scottish Enterprise and the CEO of Scottish Development International, accountable for all regional, national and international service delivery. She is also responsible for all international operations, helping Scottish businesses expand into overseas markets and attracting new high value investment to Scotland.

She joined Scottish Enterprise in 1989 and has had responsibility for a number of areas within the organisation. Her career includes roles in more than 25 countries working on a range of private sector development projects.
